p: The highest amount of phenolic compounds was identified in sample B (extracts B1 and B2), while the highest flavonoid content and highest antioxidant activity were observed in sample A (extracts A1 and A2), both from the state of Alagoas. Notably, that the Brazilian red propolis produced in Alagoas is the only propolis in the country that has a certificate of origin (geographical indication) due to the scientific recognition of its differentiated chemical composition [ 81, 82].
